If you're looking for something a bit more intense and action-packed, I'd recommend "Saving Private Ryan" (1998) - it's an iconic war drama starring Tom Hanks and Matt Damon, and it's definitely a thought-provoking film. On the other hand, if you're in the mood for something a bit more light-hearted and superhero-y, "Iron Man 3" (2013) might be up your alley - it stars Don Cheadle as James Rhodes/War Machine and Robert Downey Jr. as Tony Stark/Iron Man, and it's a fun, adrenaline-fueled ride.
